title: Exquisite Polki and Pink Sapphire Haaram - A Touch of Telugu Tradition
materials: Faceted Pink Sapphires. Hyderabadi Polish finish.
features: A modern take on the classic Haaram, this necklace features a floral-inspired pendant meticulously set with radiant Polki diamonds. Delicate chains dangle from the pendant, each adorned with a vibrant pink sapphire teardrop. The chain itself is punctuated with spaced pink sapphire beads, adding a touch of contemporary elegance.
occasions: Perfect for both traditional celebrations like weddings (pendli)
and modern events such as cocktail parties or festive gatherings.
description: This Polki Haaram seamlessly blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with contemporary design. The uncut Polki diamonds exude timeless charm, while the pink sapphires add a pop of modern color. Handcrafted by skilled artisans with Hyderabadi polish, ensuring exceptional quality and lasting brilliance.
